Module edu.citadel.cprl
Package edu.citadel.cprl

Class Type

java.lang.Object
edu.citadel.cprl.Type
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrayType
public class Type
extends java.lang.Object
This class encapsulates the language types for the programming language CPRL. Type sizes are initialized to values appropriate for the CPRL virtual machine.

    • Type

      protected Type​(java.lang.String name)
      Construct a new Type with the specified type name. Size is initially set to 0.

  • Method Details

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Returns the name for this Type.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • getSize

      public int getSize()
      Returns the number of machine addressable units (e.g., bytes or words) for this type.

    • setSize

      public void setSize​(int size)
      Sets the number of machine addressable units (e.g., bytes or words) for this type.

    • isScalar

      public boolean isScalar()
      Returns true if and only if this type is a scalar type. The scalar types in CPRL are Integer, Boolean, and Char.

    • getTypeOf

      public static Type getTypeOf​(Symbol literal)
      Returns the type of a literal symbol. For example, if the symbol is an intLiteral, then Type.Integer is returned.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the symbol is not a literal
